statements.select:
SELECT A.eo_idx, A.eo_type, A.eo_no, A.eo_nm, A.eo_occr_dt , A.eo_apply_dt, A.eo_des, A.itf_dt, A.itf_us_id, A.itf_us_nm , A.eo_cause, A.eo_attr1, A.eo_attr2, A.eo_attr3, A.eo_attr4 , A.eo_attr5, A.eo_oid, A.notuse_fl FROM itf_eo_info A WHERE 1=1
AND eo_type = #eo_type#
AND eo_no LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#eo_no#) ||'%'
AND eo_nm LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#eo_nm#) ||'%'
AND eo_occr_dt BETWEEN to_date(#eo_occr_sdt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date(#eo_occr_edt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND itf_dt BETWEEN to_timestamp(#eo_itf_sdt# || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_timestamp(#eo_itf_edt# || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND notuse_fl = #notuse_fl#
order by itf_dt desc

SELECT file_idx , part_no , part_rev_no , file_type , file_categorize , plm_file_nm , file_org_nm , file_conv_nm , file_rev_no , file_oid , file_size , file_ord FROM itf_file_info WHERE is_del = 'N'
AND file_idx = #file_idx#
AND part_no = #part_no#
AND part_rev_no = #part_rev_no#
AND file_type = #file_type#
AND file_categorize = #file_categorize#
AND file_org_nm = #file_org_nm#
AND file_oid = #file_oid#
select * from v_itf_eo_file A where eo_idx = #value#
statements.update: UPDATE itf_file_info SET is_itf='Y' WHERE file_idx=#value#
